Here's how you can take the taxi in Japan
*From train station or airports , go to the _ and wait there.
*In the street, look for a taxi that has a red light in the front window. It means the taxi has no passengers . ( If the light is green, the taxi has passengers. )
*When you see an empty taxi, wave  your hand and call it.
*The back door opens automatically , so stand back and wait until the door opens.
*Get in the taxi and tell the driver where you want to go.
*Before you get out of the taxi, pay it.
*Wait until the door opens and get out of the taxi.
